name: @adoyle.me/winston-logger
description: A wrapper of winston. For simple usage.

scripts.pub-common: npm publish --access=public && git push --tags && git rebase develop master && git push --all && git checkout develop
scripts.version-patch: npm version patch -m 'Bump: patch version to %s'
scripts.version-minor: npm version minor -m 'Bump: minor version to %s'
scripts.version-major: npm version major -m 'Bump: major version to %s'

author: ADoyle <adoyle.h@gmail.com>
